message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested but $90 is a bit steep for me.  How about $85?  I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can do $88, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. I really think you'll love this product!
